TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SimpleWorkerRequest extends System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest

summary.span: 提供 抽象類別 (Abstract Class) 的簡單實作，其可用來在網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 應用程式外部裝載 (Host) ASP.NET 應用程式。

span.span: Provides a simple implementation of the abstract class that can be used to host ASP.NET applications outside an Internet Information Services (IIS) application.

summary.span: 你可以直接使用 或加以擴充。

span.span: You can employ directly or extend it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項簡單的實作`HttpWorkerRequest`提供的要求 URL 和查詢字串，並將擷取到輸出的主體。This simple implementation of `HttpWorkerRequest` provides the request URL and the query string and captures the body of the output into a . 若要達到更豐富的功能，例如提供張貼的內容和標頭，並擷取回應標頭或回應本文為二進位資料，您應該擴充`SimpleWorkerRequest`，並覆寫適當`HttpWorkerRequest`方法。To achieve richer functionality, such as providing posted content and headers and capturing the response headers or response body as binary data, you should extend `SimpleWorkerRequest` and override the appropriate `HttpWorkerRequest` methods.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

para.span: 使用存取控制的 URL 或安全性相關決策，都會將您的應用程式置於規範化安全性弱點中。

span.span: Using the URL for access control, or security-sensitive decisions can expose your application to canonicalization security vulnerabilities.
